Modelled after VAROfficeSuite ( TM ) , IT Firm Profit Practices ( TM ) is a collection of over 30 business processes , products and services that IT firms should consider using to leverage their business and become competitive .

FuseExpertise for IT Health for SMBs and SMEs is the defacto solution for IT firms to engage their clients , identify risks and opportunities and set out client improvement plans .
Going far beyond traditional IT assessments , FuseExpertise is really providing every IT firm with a free consultant on staff through its software and content .

FuseExpertise makes that content operational - you can distribute and consume in bite sized chunks checklists , quality assurance and sales guides .
